analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#830-859):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#838-845)
	- weiAmount = ceilingStrategy.weiAllowedToReceive(msg.value,weiRaised,investedAmountOf[receiver],weiFundingCap) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#845-848)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#848-850)
	- updateInvestorFunds(tokenAmount,weiAmount,receiver,customerId) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#854-856)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#854-856)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#854-856)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#854-856)

Crowdsale.loadRefund (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#1011-1022) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-investedAmountOf[msg.sender].add(excedent) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb9aac097f4dadcd6f06761eb470346415ef28d5a.sol#1021-1022)
